task.summary: Created the VulkanShader class. Added the Resource class. Added the Resource Manager class. Successfully loading Vulkan Shader modules. Added a shell script to compile GLSL to vulkan compatible SPIR-V Updated CMakeLists.txt for the Linux build.
VulkanApplication backend works correctly. Successfully drawing a hardcoded triangle.

The VulkanMesh class works correctly. Successfully sending uniforms to the shader. Successfully sending vertex attributes to the shader. Changed the project structure. API agnostic files are compiled as a separate library. Added math utility functions. Changed the shell scripts to use glslc instead of glslangValidator in order to take advantage of the #inlcude support it provides if needed.
Swapchain resizing now works correctly. Fixed a coordinate space bug in the vertex shader.
Texture loading works. Added functions to handle images in the VulkanDevice class. Wierd segfault on static deallocation of global objects when standard validation is enabled.
Adjusted the CMake structure. Still getting segfaults on Linux/Intel GPU.
Don't know if this is a workaround of more serious problem... No more segfaults.
Moved all rendering logic to the DemoScene class. Material per object works.
Trying to figure out cpu/gpu timing and Vulkan Queries.
Created the VulkanQueryPool class. Now measuring gpu time per frame using Vulkan Timestamps.
Fixed a bug in the TransitionImageLayout function.

MESSAGE.value: Created the VulkanShader class. Added the Resource class. Added the Resource Manager class. Successfully loading Vulkan Shader modules. Added a shell script to compile GLSL to vulkan compatible SPIR-V Updated CMakeLists.txt for the Linux build.
VulkanApplication backend works correctly. Successfully drawing a hardcoded triangle.

The VulkanMesh class works correctly. Successfully sending uniforms to the shader. Successfully sending vertex attributes to the shader. Changed the project structure. API agnostic files are compiled as a separate library. Added math utility functions. Changed the shell scripts to use glslc instead of glslangValidator in order to take advantage of the #inlcude support it provides if needed.
Swapchain resizing now works correctly. Fixed a coordinate space bug in the vertex shader.
Texture loading works. Added functions to handle images in the VulkanDevice class. Wierd segfault on static deallocation of global objects when standard validation is enabled.
Adjusted the CMake structure. Still getting segfaults on Linux/Intel GPU.
Don't know if this is a workaround of more serious problem... No more segfaults.
Moved all rendering logic to the DemoScene class. Material per object works.
Trying to figure out cpu/gpu timing and Vulkan Queries.
Created the VulkanQueryPool class. Now measuring gpu time per frame using Vulkan Timestamps.
Fixed a bug in the TransitionImageLayout function.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed a bug in the TransitionImageLayout function.
